郼字的基本解释

郼
yī
中国殷商国名。

郼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yī］
［《廣韻》於希切，平微，影。］
殷之封国名。

郼字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郼； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1274第08
【廣韻】【集韻】?於希切，音依。【廣韻】殷國名。【呂覽·愼大篇】湯爲天子，夏民親郼如夏。【高註】郼，讀如衣。今兗州人謂殷氏皆曰衣。又【呂覽·慎勢篇】湯其無郼，武其無岐，不能成功。【註】郼，湯之本國。【正字通】郼非卽殷字。齊人讀殷如衣，高註讀郼如衣，皆方音，非定音也。

考證：〔【呂覽·愼大篇】湯爲天子，夏民親郼如夏。【高繡曰】郼讀如衣。今兗州人謂殷氏皆曰衣。〕　謹照原文高繡曰改高註。〔【呂覽·憤勢篇】湯其無郼，武其無岐豐也。【註】郼，殷舊封國名。〕　謹照原文憤勢篇改慎勢篇。武其無岐下省豐也二字。增不能成功四字。註郼殷舊封國名改註郼湯之本國。
郼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
郼字的起名意思

中国殷商国名。

Basic explanation of words
Xi
yī
The name of China's Shang Dynasty.
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yī］
["Guangyun" Yu Xiqie, Ping Wei, Shadow. ]
Yin Zhifeng the name of the country.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　郼; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 1274 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Xiqie, Yinyi. [Guangyun] The name of Yin country. [Lv Lan·Shou Da Pian] Tang is the emperor, and Xia Min is close to Xia. [High Note] Xi, read like clothes. Today, the people of Yanzhou say that the Yin family all call clothes. Also [Lv Lan·Shen Shi Chapter] Tang Qi Wu Xi, Wu Qi Wu Qi, can not succeed. [Note] Xi, Tangzhi's own country. 【Zhengzitong】Yin Fei Fei Yin. The Qi people read Yin like clothing, and high notes read Yi as clothing, both in square accents and non-fixed accents. Textual research: [[Lv Lan·Dao Pian] Tang is the emperor, and Xia Min is close to Xia. [Gao Xiu said] Reading is like clothes. Today, the people of Yanzhou say that the Yin family all call clothes. 〕 　 I would like to change the high note according to the original Gao Xiu. 〔【Lu Lan·Indignation】Tang Qi has no Xi, Wu Qi has no Qi Feng. [Note] Xi, Yin Jiu sealed the name of the country. 〕 　I would like to change the Shenshi chapter according to the original article. Wu Qi has no ambiguity under the word Shengfeng. Increase the four characters that cannot be successful. Note Xi Yin’s old name was changed to the name of Xi Tang’s home country.
